Indeed, nobody, except maybe Sergio Marchionne himself, believed Chrysler could redo its product line so dramatically in 18 months. They just accomplished a tremendous amount of work in a short time, and with limited resources, said Rebecca Lindland, an analyst with IHS Automotive, who admits she was an early doubter. As for the governor's reaction, the Los Angeles Times reports that Jerry Brown hoped the Community Redevelopment Agency was not planning on "squirreling money away for the indefinite future when our schools, police and firefighters are in need of this funding.' The state has not threatened specific legal action.
